content: विली {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To cling or stick to, adhere to. {@--2@} To rest on, settle down or alight on; पुरोऽस्य यावन्न भुविव्यलीयत <ls>Śi. 1. 12.</ls> {@--3@} To be dissolved, to melt away, be absorbed in; विलिल्ये यत्कुक्षिस्थितशिखिनि वातापिवपुषा <ls>Mv. 6. 60</ls>; <ls n="Mv.">7. 14.</ls> {@--4@} To vanish, disappear. {@--5@} To perish. {vII.v} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> To melt, liquefy.
